author: adrianocrestani
msg: - added RefCountingObject to solve a repo problem

author: jliu
msg: Fixed a problem in handler chain to make sure handleFault is properly invoked when server side servant throws exception to outbound fault chain. The logic of current implementation is if the exception is thrown from previous handlers, we only invoke handleFault if it is a ProtocolException (per spec), if the exception is thrown from other places other than handlers, we always invoke handleFault.
